sentence: READ MORE: Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick acknowledges that while, at least for now, this ban will cost Americans, he says it is the only way to break Russia’s grip on our wallets.
author: Alicia Roberts
title: Pennsylvania Congressman Says Decision To Ban Russian Energy Imports Needed To Happen

sentence: “It’s not just an investment in the future, it’s an investment in the present,” Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick said.
title: With Money Coming From Federal Government, Montgomery County Could See More Congestion Than Usual This Construction Season
